control.onControlLoad:
<%
if (session.get("username").length == 0) {
    response.redirect("ee.aspx?_L_=/qrUserCenter/hint/login");
}
%>

g5.pageSize = 15;
g5.pageCurrent = 1;
g5.pageCount = 1;
g5.pageJump = function (pageNumber) {
    if (pageNumber<1) pageNumber = 1;
    if (pageNumber>g5.pageCount) {
        pageNumber = g5.pageCount;
    }
    if (g5.pageCurrent!=pageNumber) {
        g5.pageCurrent = pageNumber;
        if (g5.pageCurrent>0) {
            query();
        }
    }
}

g5.refreshDetail = function(index) {
    ee.setText(ee.getControl("layoutxitem23"), ee.getText(ee.getControl("tablebody1").cols[0].rows[index]));
    ee.setEditText(ee.getControl("edit5"), ee.getText(ee.getControl("tablebody1").cols[1].rows[index]));
    var s = ee.getText(ee.getControl("tablebody1").cols[3].rows[index]).split("-");
    ee.setEditText(ee.getControl("edit6"), s[0]);
    ee.setEditText(ee.getControl("edit7"), s[1]);
    ee.setEditText(ee.getControl("edit8"), ee.getText(ee.getControl("tablebody1").cols[5].rows[index]));
}

query();

taskSetItem.name: query
insert
del
modify
